tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I Visited here from Bokaro steel city, jharkhand for my daughter's implant treatment 
I pay my gratitude to Doctor Abhishek Sir and 
 Dr Archana mam for their kind support in all walks of my stay . 
  Both of them having their brilliant experience , friendly behaviour, and a great positive response to visitors are awesome.  
 Overall their smile serve smile face.
 Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very much satisfied with the treatment..Had gone for severe pain in my teeth and it was treated so well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He was extremely patient while dealing with me, explained the details regarding the reason for the pain and swelling and the treatment gave me quick relief and a fast recovery.

His friendliness was his strength and hope to continue treatment from him in future too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Abhishek for dental examination and TMJ pains. He advised wisdom tooth removal and took all precautions like blood examination. OPG. X-ray antibiotics before extraction. extraction was a simple painless procedure and it was Surgical. After words healing was smooth and to my surprise TMG pains, decreased. Some sensitivity issues and gum, irritation issues still remain, which will be sorted out in a systematic manner. What I liked most was that Dr was not in a hurry and explained all issues in detail to my satisfaction.Thanks to Dr Abhishek .
reply_text:
Respected Sir,
Thanks for your very kind feedback .I am extremely grateful to you for taking time out from your busy schedule and penning this down.It means a lot to me and motivates me to simply give our best to the patients,
Warm Regards ,
Dr Abhishek Bhardwaj

tags: Value for money,

reply_text:
Respected Madam ,
The prices were told to you before the starting of the procedure,Thanks for your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

review: Dr Abhishek Bhardwaj was excellent,  very eminent & experienced dentist doctor from whom I got my tooth implant & filling work done. I did have any problem during the treatment about the pain or any other issue. Very soft spoken & explained me thourhely during the treatment. Very nice dentist I met in my life. I rate him 10 out of 10 & recommend him to all my friends & relatives.
reply_text:
Respected Sir ,
I will like to thank you for your very kind review myself and Dr Archana we try to give our best to the the patients and such kind words motivates us further to excel.It is always a pleasure to treat you sir ,
Warm regards ,
Dr Abhishek Bhardwaj

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My advice - do not think twice, just visit the clinic if you're looking for a dentist! 

A couple months late, but I think this review would be helpful for the ones worried about the aftermath of RCT. The services that Mrs. Archana and Mr. Abhishek provided me were impeccable. They make you feel like home with their gentle and kind nature, and explain to you each and every detail patiently. The staff is extremely friendly and the clinic is well maintained. After RCT, I'm able to chew like before, and the cap doesn't even feel like it's there at all! My tooth looks absolutely real and I'm extremely happy with the results of the RCT. 

Most importantly, since a lot of people are afraid of getting an RCT done, I can vouch that the procedure was pretty much painless for me. They're absolute experts and just know what they're doing! 

I hope this review clears all your worries and helps you make a decision for yourself.  ^_^

review:
A heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Abhishek Bhardwaj. I feel blessed to have gotten treated by him. I'm petrified of dentists, hence, I had been postponing my wisdom teeth extractions for 6 months. The situation got critical. I experienced severe pain in my jaw and gums. He handled both the teeth with such finesse. A true professional; not did he just create a relaxed atmosphere, he even explained to me politely at every step what I must expect.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I don't Recommend Dr. Abhishek Bhartwaj & Dr Rachna as they will ask for X-Ray ***** **** **** ** *** **** ** *** ***** **** **** **** ********* ** ** ** ** ***** *** *******
Dont go with only Consultation fee **** **** *** ** ****** ***** **** ********Consultation fee is only INR 300 but they will ask for X-Ray OPD INR 700 and X-Digital INR 200 in their own clinic ***** **** ** ****
reply_text:
Dear patient
We regret that we could not satisfy your expectations completely. However, we followed a protocol that is scientific and ethical. You complained of cavities, pain in your molar and had impacted wisdom teeth. All these necessitate dental x-rays.  In fact, after viewing the same, we advised you not to initiate root canal therapy immediately. But as it was your first dental visit ever, you might not have appreciated the same. 
Also, the need and prices were explained to you. Only after your consent, did we go ahead with the same. You also insisted on taking your x-rays before making an online payment, which we still haven't received. 
We hope future sessions at other centers might clear your confusion. Wish you the very best.

tags: None
review:
For quite some time, my lower wisdom tooth had been troubling me. I even tried gum flap removal, but the pain came back. After a particularly painful night, I consulted Dr  Bhardwaj. He is the go-to person for this pain. He explained everything in detail on my x-ray as to why the tooth will never come out totally on its own. Also he was honest about the chance that it may need surgery.
We agreed to remove it, and luckily surgery was not needed. I am satisfied by my treatment.
